statements.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into Hotel (GUID,Name,City,county,Area,Address,Phone,Line,biz,Cost,Website,Logo,Descr,HotelType,installationsStr,installationsVal,CREATOR,CREATE_DATE,Laste_update_date,Laste_update_By,QQ,aliww,Tag,Map,ShowPr,Mobile,Status,MaxPrice,MinPrice,ViewTimes,email,IsSendOrderEmail) values (#Guid#,#Name#,#City#,#County#,#Area#,#Address#,#Phone#,#Line#,#Biz#,#Cost#,#Website#,#Logo#,#Descr#,#Hoteltype#,#Installationsstr#,#Installationsval#,#Creator#,#CreateDate#,#LasteUpdateDate#,#LasteUpdateBy#,#Qq#,#Aliww#,#Tag#,#Map#,#Showpr#,#Mobile#,#Status#,#Maxprice#,#Minprice#,#Viewtimes#,#Email#,#Issendorderemail#)
statements.update: update Hotel set GUID=#Guid# ,Name=#Name# ,City=#City# ,county=#County# ,Area=#Area# ,Address=#Address# ,Phone=#Phone# ,Line=#Line# ,biz=#Biz# ,Cost=#Cost# ,Website=#Website# ,Logo=#Logo# ,Descr=#Descr# ,HotelType=#Hoteltype# ,installationsStr=#Installationsstr# ,installationsVal=#Installationsval# ,CREATOR=#Creator# ,CREATE_DATE=#CreateDate# ,Laste_update_date=#LasteUpdateDate# ,Laste_update_By=#LasteUpdateBy# ,QQ=#Qq# ,aliww=#Aliww# ,Tag=#Tag# ,Map=#Map# ,ShowPr=#Showpr# ,Mobile=#Mobile# ,Status=#Status# ,MaxPrice=#Maxprice# ,MinPrice=#Minprice# ,ViewTimes=#Viewtimes# ,email=#Email# ,IsSendOrderEmail=#Issendorderemail# where Seqno=#Seqno#
